did.unittitle: Bank Account Records, John Wesley Hunt

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises seven account books documenting John Welsey Hunt's account with the Kentucky Insurance Co. from February 1807 to March 1813, an account book documenting John Wesley Hunt's account with the Bank of Pennsylvania from June 1813 to July 1813, and four account books documenting John Wesley Hunt's account with the Lexington Branch Bank from November 1813 to March 1817.
